ED_Title: Cooperation between the United Nations and the Community of Portuguese-speaking Countries
ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 9 September 2021, the General Assembly decided to defer consideration of the sub-item entitled “Cooperation between the United Nations and the Community of Portuguese-speaking Countries” of the item entitled “Cooperation between the United Nations and regional and other organizations” and to include it in the draft agenda of its seventy-sixth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
